__e: When the statue comes, you, the Herod of Galilee, must be here, ready to take his place, reclaim what it rightfully yours, and get rid of these Jesus followers once and for all. Who's there?
You are coming with us, filthy, blasphemous followers of Jesus.
- We've got a follower of Jesus here!
- We've got a follower of Jesus here!
He thought that I was saying, that his flock were animals. Which of course in some sense I was, because all humans are all animals.
To do with your connection, to the right-wing followers of the club?
He'll keep her close to him and his fellow zealots... and they'll be with the last group to leave.
Actually, it's not just a lesson for him, but you, your followers, and the entire world.
I am the guy that killed all your followers, put you on death row!
Then why did you tell your disciples that I'm some hero?
I mean, give him something that he can use to convince his followers that this isn't their time to go.
And then after that, it'll be the rest of the world-- all except his followers, who go together to make his great master race.
I mean, you have so many followers on your blog, like, why don't you just be a regular writer?
Except that she has three million Twitter followers and you have a hard time handling two e-mail accounts.
Got a following down in the village-- good kids too, like Charlie.
You have more followers than me!
So I'd have more of my Lord's people inside the Church.
It could be a coded message from Joe to his followers.
Of the two employees who left the theater, one name rang a bell, so I ran a search of his mug from his work badge against all of Felicia's followers, and I got a hit.
Meanwhile, life is a bowl of cherries for the folks who can't call daddy and fly home when things get interesting, all because of two bible-thumping fools who haven't got a clue.
Don't get your head turned by a bunch of Bible-thumpers.
